PATIENT_ID: TEST_ROLE_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-27 06:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-27 06:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 45-year-old male, gunshot wound to abdomen.
Trauma patient presenting to Deaconess Midtown Hospital.
BP 90/60, HR 120, RR 24, GCS 14.

[ED_NOTE] 2026-01-27 06:15:00
Trauma activation level: Category I. Activation level documented.
Patient admitted to Trauma Services. Admission determination made.
Admitted to trauma service per protocol.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-27 06:20:00
Trauma Surgeon notified at 06:12. Trauma surgeon contacted via ESA Call Center.
Trauma Surgeon responded and arrived in the ED to evaluate the patient at 0627.
Trauma Surgeon assessment completed. Response time documented.
Decision to proceed to OR for exploratory laparotomy.

[CONSULT_NOTE] 2026-01-27 10:00:00
Post-operative course stable. I have seen and examined patient on the above stated date.
Sign-off completed for trauma service management. Receiving service identified.
Trauma services transfer of care complete.
